creditline: Gift of Metro Pictures, New York
description: four separately-framed photographs in black frames; each photo is a composite image with images inside a black construction against a dark blue ground; a: white rectangles, white paint drips at bottom, white Venetian blinds in URQ, squatting figure in rain, sculptural image with face in profile at left; b: skull-like silhouette with open mouth and tongue, black circle with red-orange rays behind it, white brick wall with blue paint above, vertical white lines (light beams?); c: white rectangles, white paint drips at bottom, blue and white vertical forms at right, black and white portrait of a woman in profile at left; d: white rectangles, white paint drips at bottom, shadowy diamond pattern in ULQ, old room with ruined ceiling and two pillars in LRQ, part of face in a circle in URQ, "A Time of Tragedy" in LLQ
title: A Composition for Detroit
